The mechanistic discussion partly relies on non-transcript “knowledge graph” relationships and an irrelevant citation (P-15 sore/raw throat) to explain pleuritic pain.

summary: The Generated Answer captures the main pneumonia-supporting features and appropriately links pleuritic pain to pleural involvement, but it omits some Gold Answer details (fever timeline, constant pain, smoking risk) and adds multiple non-transcript “knowledge graph” assertions that reduce faithfulness.
